fixes.name: Cuenta de hombres
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR currentId = SELECTEDVALUE('historicoEducacionCLEAN (historicoEducacionCLEAN)'[Identificacion])
RETURN
IF(
    ISBLANK(currentId),
    BLANK(),
    CALCULATE(
        COUNTROWS('historicoEducacionCLEAN (historicoEducacionCLEAN)'),
        ALL('historicoEducacionCLEAN (historicoEducacionCLEAN)'),
        'historicoEducacionCLEAN (historicoEducacionCLEAN)'[Identificacion] = currentId,
        'historicoEducacionCLEAN (historicoEducacionCLEAN)'[Sexo egresados] = "Masculino"
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the FIXED LOD that counts rows where [Sexo egresados] = "Masculino" per [Identificacion] into a measure. Uses SELECTEDVALUE to capture the current Identificacion, removes other filters with ALL, and then counts rows matching that Identificacion and Sexo egresados = "Masculino".
fixes.type_changed_reason: The Tableau expression uses a FIXED LOD aggregation ({ FIXED ... }), which is an aggregation/context-based calculation and must be implemented as a measure in Power BI.
